title: Why deeplabcut.create_labeled_video() inside Docker, uses the CPU instead of the GPU? to create videos
body:
Using: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, with an Anaconda Env, & DeepLabCut 2.0.4.1
=> **Why during deeplabcut.create_labeled_video() inside Docker, python is using the CPU instead of the GPU to create videos (... save_frames = True)?** My GPU is 0%; 3 threads of my CPU are 100%.
Obs:. It also says I cannot use save_frame=False for cropped videos! Has it been implemented?

```
In [16]: deeplabcut.create_labeled_video(path_config,['/home/rodrigo/DLC_proj_Joao-Rod-2019-02-04/videos/CTR_R4_WaltDisney_NAOFamiliar_1.avi'],save_fram
    ...: es=True)
Starting %  /home/rodrigo/DLC_proj_Joao-Rod-2019-02-04/videos ['/home/rodrigo/DLC_proj_Joao-Rod-2019-02-04/videos/CTR_R4_WaltDisney_NAOFamiliar_1.avi']
Loading  /home/rodrigo/DLC_proj_Joao-Rod-2019-02-04/videos/CTR_R4_WaltDisney_NAOFamiliar_1.avi and data.
True 255 537 93 446
41230
Duration of video [s]:  1374.33 , recorded with  30.0 fps!
Overall # of frames:  41230 with cropped frame dimensions:  282 353
Generating frames and creating video.
                                                                                                                                                       [mpeg4 @ 0x55133180] slice end not reached but screenspace end (7 left 7E0000, score= -2)
Exception in thread Thread-740:
Traceback (most recent call last):                  
Traceback (most recent call last):                                                                                    | 6/41230 [00:00<46:10, 14.88it/s]
  File "/usr/lib/python3.6/threading.py", line 916, in _bootstrap_inner
    self.run()                                                                                                       | 42/41230 [00:02<47:46, 14.37it/s]
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/tqdm/_tqdm.py", line 144, in run
    for instance in self.tqdm_cls._instances:
  File "/usr/lib/python3.6/_weakrefset.py", line 60, in __iter__
    for itemref in self.data:
RuntimeError: Set changed size during iteration
```
